doc.name: Barrier
doc.description: This actor implements multiway rendezvous on all channels of the input port, collects the tokens, and then performs a multiway rendezvous on all channels of the output port, sending the collected data. A token provided on an input channel is sent to the corresponding output channel. If there are fewer output channels than input channels, then the corresponding input data are discarded. If there are fewer input channels than output channels, then the last input channel provides the token for the remaining ones. If there are no input channels, then an exception is thrown.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.port: The input port, which is a multiport that can accept any data type.
The output port, which is a multiport whose type is at least that of the input port.
